subject: Basketball
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: Knicks fan Mara Altschuler claimed to hear Coach Isiah Thomas say, “We’re missing layups because the crowd is booing,” during Monday night’s loss to Dallas.
snippet: Knicks fan Mara Altschuler claimed to hear Coach Isiah Thomas say, “We’re missing layups because the crowd is booing,” during Monday night’s loss to Dallas.
